member.name: M:Ivi.SessionFactory.Interop.IIviSessionFactory.CreateDriver(System.String)
member.summary: The CreateDriver method creates an instance of an IVI-COM driver and returns a System.Object to the caller. The creation process uses the Configuration Server to map the provided LogicalName to the ProgID of an actual driver. The ProgID used to create the driver is retrieved configuration store.
member.param: Logical name of the IVI-COM driver to create.
member.returns: System.Object which must be cast to the appropriate IVI instrument class.

member.name: M:Ivi.SessionFactory.Interop.IIviSessionFactory.CreateSession(System.String)
member.summary: The CreateSession method creates an instance of an IVI-COM role and returns a System.Object to the caller. The creation process uses the Configuration Server to map the provided LogicalName to the ProgID of an actual role. The ProgID used to create the role is retrieved from the appropriate IviSession entry in the configuration store.
member.param: Logical name of the IVI-COM driver to create.
member.returns: System.Object which must be cast to the role's type.

The creation process uses the Configuration Server to map the provided LogicalName to the ProgID of an actual driver. The ProgID used to create the driver is retrieved configuration store.

member.returns: System.Object which must be cast to the appropriate IVI instrument class.

The ProgID used to create the role is retrieved from the appropriate IviSession entry in the configuration store.
member.param: Logical name of the IVI-COM driver to create.
